abilities.name: Burning Aura
abilities.text: As long as Typhlosion is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Typhlosion.
